data.title: Laurence Marks Books
data.meta_description: Explore the full range of the best books by Laurence Marks at World of Books. Our used books are available at the best prices with free delivery in the UK. Page 1
data.text:
Books by Laurence Marks

Laurence Marks is the acclaimed co-creator with Maurice Gran of SHINE ON HARVEY MOON, BIRDS OF A FEATHER, NEW STATESMAN and GOODNIGHT SWEETHEART and two new sitcoms will be produced in 1999. He was born in Islington, near the Arsenal stadium.
